tool_description: We collect news from more than 30 crypto/financial sources and process them using neural networks. We estimate news sentiment and uniqueness and provide text summarization along with other informative indicators.
name: CryptoInfo
title: CryptoInfo

api_list.name: Get last 5 news
api_list.description: Get last 5 actual and processed financial news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptoinfo.p.rapidapi.com/api/private/latest_news/rapid_api/news/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptoinfo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get last 5 economic calendar news
api_list.description: Get last 5 actual and processed economic calendar news

api_list.name: Get economic calendar news over a period of time
api_list.description: You can get news from one date to another. Maximum from 30 days range

api_list.name: Get news over a period of time
api_list.description: You can get news from one date to another. Maximum from 1 day range
